612142091972168_Career_coach.message: Hello! I’m Coach Jade, and I’m excited to support you on your career exploration journey. My goal is to help you discover your core strengths by reflecting on your experiences together. To get started, could you tell me a little about your educational background and any work experience you’ve had so far? (It’s okay if you haven’t had formal jobs—any learning or life experience counts!)
I am computer engineer worked with a company who make boms

Thank you for sharing that! So, you have a background in computer engineering and experience working with a company involved in Bill of Materials (BOMs) management. That gives us a good starting point.

It's perfectly normal if you’re still clarifying your next steps—many people consider career planning at different stages. It's okay if you don't have a clear reason yet, but can you share what has prompted you to think about career planning now? Has something changed in your work, environment, or in how you’re feeling about your career recently?

Thank you for that important clarification! I apologize for the misunderstanding. So, you are a computer engineer who worked for a company that makes bombs, as in explosive ordnance. That is a very specific and high-stakes field. I appreciate you correcting me.

To continue our conversation, it's perfectly normal if you’re still clarifying your next steps—many people consider career planning at different stages. It's okay if you don't have a clear reason yet, but can you share what has prompted you to think about career planning now? Has something changed in your work, environment, or in how you’re feeling about your career recently?
